Package org.thewhitemage13.service

Class UserServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
org.thewhitemage13.service.UserServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserServiceInterface
@Service @Transactional public class UserServiceImpl extends Object implements UserServiceInterface
Implementation of the UserServiceInterface, providing user management functionality.

This service layer handles operations such as user creation, updating, deletion, and retrieval. It integrates with the UserRepository, validation logic, and Kafka for event publishing.

Key Features:

  • User creation with validation and password encoding.
  • Fetching user details using caching for improved performance.
  • Integration with Kafka for publishing user-related events.
  • Transactional support to ensure data consistency.

Dependencies:

  • UserRepository for database interactions.
  • UserProcessorImpl for converting user entities to DTOs.
  • ValidationServiceImpl for data validation and auxiliary operations.
  • KafkaTemplate for publishing user events.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Mukhammed Lolo

    • updateUserProfile

      @CacheEvict(value={"users","usernames"}, key="#userId") public void updateUserProfile(Long userId, CreateUserDTO createUserDTO) throws UsernameIsBusyException, org.thewhitemage13.exception.UserNotFoundException, EmailAlreadyTakenException, EmailBusyException, com.google.i18n.phonenumbers.NumberParseException
      Updates the profile of an existing user and publishes an update event via Kafka.
      Specified by:
      updateUserProfile in interface UserServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique ID of the user to be updated
      createUserDTO - the DTO containing the updated user data
      Throws:
      org.thewhitemage13.exceptions.UserNotFoundException - if no user is found with the given ID
      UsernameIsBusyException - if the new username is already in use
      EmailAlreadyTakenException - if the new email is already taken
      EmailBusyException - if the email is invalid
      com.google.i18n.phonenumbers.NumberParseException - if the phone number format is invalid

    • registerNewUser

      public void registerNewUser(CreateUserDTO createUserDTO) throws UsernameIsBusyException, EmailAlreadyTakenException, EmailBusyException, com.google.i18n.phonenumbers.NumberParseException
      Registers a new user in the system and publishes a creation event via Kafka.
      Specified by:
      registerNewUser in interface UserServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      createUserDTO - the DTO containing the new user's data
      Throws:
      UsernameIsBusyException - if the username is already in use
      EmailAlreadyTakenException - if the email is already taken
      EmailBusyException - if the email is invalid
      com.google.i18n.phonenumbers.NumberParseException - if the phone number format is invalid
